recommendations.blocking_issue: LocalStorage hydration issue should be investigated - form validation doesn't trigger on page load with pre-populated data
recommendations.potential_fix: Implement useEffect to trigger form validation after LocalStorage data loads
recommendations.testing_workflow: Playwright MCP successfully demonstrates end-to-end form completion despite hydration issue
